name: home.dip.sh
description: Static homepage with Tailwind CSS (JIT, purged)

scripts.dev:html: mkdir -p dist && chokidar --cwd . --initial index.html -c "html-minifier-terser index.html -o dist/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-optional-tags --minify-js true"
scripts.dev:assets: mkdir -p dist && chokidar --cwd . --initial 'static/**/*' 'img/**/*' -c "bun run optimize:images && bun run build:assets"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n css,html,assets "bun run dev:css" "bun run dev:html" "bun run dev:assets"
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -R static/* dist/ && cp -R img dist/img && cp -f CNAME dist/CNAME
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && bun run optimize:images && bun run build:css && bun run build:assets && bun run build:html
